root.name: Polar Panic
root.description: OverviewPolar Panic is a downloadable action puzzle game for Xbox Live and PSN. Controlling Polar the Bear, the player must push blocks and defeat enemies to reach the level exit. It features a Story Mode, a Puzzle Mode, a Survivor Mode and a Multiplayer Mode.A scaled down version focused on the puzzle mode was released for PlayStation Minis as Arctic Adventures. An additional version was released for PlayStation Mobile as Arctic Adventures Brain Freeze, featuring 50 new levels, with the ones from previous games available as DLC.
